Message:
the pilgrims defended me
like they were ready to
accompany me to jail.
You’ve got to be kidding me.

Just when I thought I’d finally
be able to get away from them...

As I was tied up and pulled away,
they said “thank you” to me.

You idiots...
I fooled all of you, you know.

I was thrown in jail,
which I thought to be
quite the fitting end for
a liar like me.

But for some reason,
here I am now,

safely smelling the fresh air
from outside the prison walls.
